channel.title: Version 2.3 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 2.3.0 (2021-09-13) Hugo 0.81.0 0.81.0 This release requires a newer Hugo version. New New Showcase multilanguage features by providing a documentation translation “fer us pirrrates”. There will be no other translations besides the original English one and the Piratish one due to maintenance constraints.
